name: Vengeance of Excalibur
description:
Vengeance of Excalibur is an adventure, RPG and strategy game developed by Synergistic Software and Northwest Synergistic Software. It was originally released in 1991. It was published by Virgin Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Vengeance of Excalibur on Commodore / Amiga, Atari ST and PC.
